metadata.title: CVE-2021-21226 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Use after free in navigation in Google Chrome prior to 90.0.4430.85 alloweda remote attacker who had compromised the renderer process to potentiallyperform a sandbox escape via a crafted HTML page.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
